name: Marked

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in Faction Crypts by 15%

skills.name: Dance of Blades
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +109
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +109
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10'
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10

skills.name: Punishment of Gods
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 25% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Totemic Power
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 1 turn and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Barbarians is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 27 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: The Barbarians of Hark'han are opportunists ever eager to offertheir mercenary services to the highest bidder. When theservants of the Corruption first came from the East with theirdragon, they quickly made a pact granting them control of theregion they now patrol as the Deadlands.
